name: Dingbots
description: Prepare yourself for 30 levels of epileptic violence complete with 6 brutal bosses. Your enemies behave in wildly different ways, so you must react quickly. Activating your shield at just the right moment might save your life from a stray bullet, but beware! Your shield's power drains rapidly and must be allowed to recharge. Mastering this skill and others will be crucial to your survival. Whether you're new to twin-stick shooters or a seasoned veteran of Robotron, Dingbots has something for you: a FISTFUL of SHRAPNEL.
